REST controller that provides endpoints for managing and querying integrated tools with filtering capabilities.

## Key Components

- **`getTools()`** - Main endpoint that retrieves tools with optional filtering by enabled status, type, category, and text search
- **`getToolFilters()`** - Endpoint that returns available filter options for tool queries
- **Dependencies**: `ToolService` for business logic, `ToolMapper` for DTO conversion
- **DTOs**: Uses `ToolFilterCriteria`, `ToolsResponse`, and `ToolFilterResponse` for data transfer

## Usage Example

```java
// GET /api/v1/tools - Get all tools
// GET /api/v1/tools?enabled=true&type=API&search=payment&category=finance
// Response: ToolsResponse with filtered tools

// GET /api/v1/tools/filters
// Response: ToolFilterResponse with available filter options

// Client usage
@Autowired
private RestTemplate restTemplate;

public ToolsResponse getEnabledApiTools() {
    String url = "/api/v1/tools?enabled=true&type=API";
    return restTemplate.getForObject(url, ToolsResponse.class);
}

public ToolFilterResponse getAvailableFilters() {
    return restTemplate.getForObject("/api/v1/tools/filters", ToolFilterResponse.class);
}
```

The controller includes comprehensive OpenAPI documentation with detailed response schemas and error handling for common HTTP status codes.
